datatransferobjects

Class Title

  • java.lang.Object
    • datatransferobjects.Title

  • public class Title
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all the data for a book's title, including its title, ISBN, edition, and copyright.
    Version:
    1.0.0 March 30, 2015
    Author:
    Richard Barney

      private java.lang.String title
      String to hold a book's title
